The Quranic researcher, if you know the knowledge of the yakin, that is, if you know what is between your hands, the knowledge of the miserable matter, that is, your knowledge is what you do not know, then you will not know, then you will not know, And the one in the sense of the one who is a row is a row for an estimated, and Abu Hayyan has passed as the addition of the addition of the description to his class; That is, the flag, and the plot of description is a definition that is based on the fact that science is called on others, and the answer is "if" is deleted to the way; That is, if you knew, you would have done what is not described and not disturbed, or for you to occupy this from the multiplication and otherwise, or the part of that.
